item.title: Super Bowl MVP odds: Christian McCaffrey, Patrick Mahomes, Travis Kelce lead
item.description: Big Noon Kickoff Presents “The Bear Bets Podcast” as gambling expert Chris “The Bear” Fallica and former NFL Offensive Lineman Geoff Schwartz are joined by friends and professional bettors Sam Panayotovich and Will Hill in The Gambling Group Chat to discuss the latest Super Bowl MVP odds surrounding San Francisco 49ers’ Christian McCaffrey and the Kansas City Chiefs’ Travis Kelce and Patrick Mahomes.

item.title: Minnesota Vikings WR Justin Jefferson: 'I want to break the bank'
item.description: Minnesota Vikings star wide receiver Justin Jefferson, who is one year out from free agency, wants to "break the bank" with his next contract.

item.title: Chargers GM doubles down on multiple titles goal, too much on Justin Herbert? | Speak
item.description: Jim Harbaugh is not the only one with high expectations in Los Angeles. New Chargers GM Joe Hortiz double-downed on the goal of winning multiple championships. Emmanuel Acho, Joy Taylor, LeSean McCoy and James Jones debate whether they are placing too much pressure on Justin Herbert or not.

item.title: Super Bowl is a monolith — but other sports are capitalizing in Las Vegas
item.description: For years, rival sports steered clear of the Super Bowl host city. That is no longer the case, with events now lasting the entire week across multiple sports.

item.title: 49ers' Tashaun Gipson Sr. says win over Lions was 'not our brand of football'
item.description: Veteran safety isn't concerned that San Francisco will lack effort in the Super Bowl. "It's nothing I'm worried about moving forward."
